00022 class Integrator

00042     virtual ~Integrator(){}
00048     inline void setSamplingPeriod(double samplingPeriod) { d_samplingPeriod = samplingPeriod; }
00054     inline void setInitialValue(const T &initialValue) { d_initialValue = initialValue; }
